scripts.build: make-dir bundled dist && rm -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && tsc --build --verbose && node --preserve-symlinks --preserve-symlinks-main esbuild/bundler.js
scripts.build:table: make-dir bundled dist && rm -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && tsc --build --verbose && node --preserve-symlinks --preserve-symlinks-main esbuild/bundler-table.js
